ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger creme de cacao
des: "This sweet and creamy martini is rich enough to be considered a dessert."
ins: Pour the chocolate liqueur, creme de cacao, vodka, and creamer into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Dip the rim of a chilled martini glass in chocolate syrup. Strain the cocktail into the glass to serve.
